thread.title: Why Biden’s 2016 campaign window has closed PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Why Biden’s 2016 campaign window has closed | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Why Biden’s 2016 campaign window has closed PBS NewsHour
text: Vice President Joe Biden will not join the presidential race, despite months of pondering the possibility. What drove his decision and how does it affect the other candidates in the race? Gwen Ifill gets perspective from Glenn Thrush of Politico.
